channel.title: Janis and Joyce
channel.itunes:author: Chabbey
channel.description: An old lady named Janis takes you through her day to day affairs. Stop by every week to see what Janis is up to and how she handles various situations.
channel.itunes:subtitle: An old lady named Janis takes you through her day to day affairs. Stop by every week to see what Janis is up to and how she handles various situations.
channel.itunes:summary: An old lady named Janis takes you through her day to day affairs. Stop by every week to see what Janis is up to and how she handles various situations.
channel.itunes:keywords: funny, old lady, comedy, cult following, humor, bizzare, strange, weird, funny voice

item.title: The Purchase (skit)
item.itunes:author: Chabbey
item.description: Janis is cleaning out the grocery store on a particular product. She has a few quirks when it comes to checking out. Her hygiene and cleanliness cause problems with the staff and other patrons.
item.itunes:subtitle: Janis is cleaning out the grocery store on a particular product. She has a few quirks when it comes to checking out. Her hygiene and cleanliness cause problems with the staff and other patrons too.
item.itunes:summary: Janis is cleaning out the grocery store on a particular product. She has a few quirks when it comes to checking out. Her hygiene and cleanliness cause problems with the staff and other patrons.

item.title: The Mechanic (skit)
item.itunes:author: Chabbey
item.description: Janis brings her car in for some repair work. Apparently her car started having problems after she left Big Time Burger.
